data.message: Feeling from distance? Do you really think this is ignorance? I’m hearing the calling – If this is a trap do you believe me fall in? Might get? Is this what you already set? So where is it – the dark side? It can’t compare with a pure mind. You woke me up – there’s no way you can give up. Now it’s pretty clear, I’m not a liar. Expose myself to which price, so let’s roll destiny’s dice. You dazzle my senses like a flashlight, so I guess you are my highlight. I’m feeling like in trance, it makes my heart wanna dance. It isn’t a game, in some way we are the same. This could be the last chance, but not for me I guess. If you don’t care about it, I might try to forget it.
